Muon slice FTK tautau sample MuonSlice FTK tautau sample EventMax=5000;runMergedChain=True;doFTK=True TrigInDetValidation_RTT_topOptions_MuonSlice Trigger/TrigValidation/TrigInDetValidation TrigInDetValidation long

exeName TIDArdict.exe
exeParamString TIDAdata11-rtt.dat -f data-muon-FTK.root -p 13 -b Test_bin.dat

exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
